85632.summary: Some customers in the East Saint Paul area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
85632.title: Dec 27 - Winnipeg (East Saint Paul) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

85637.summary: Some customers in the Capitol Hill area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
85637.title: Dec 27 - Calgary (Capitol Hill) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
